Quest.QuestDescription: The Blood Elves are growing in numbers. Speak to a Commander to find out how you can help.

Task.TaskText: A Commander can be found at the castle

Conversation.Dialogue: {CHARACTER_NAME}: Commander what seems to be the problem?
Commander: The Blood Elves have set up camp just outside the castle walls.
Commander: I've deployed some guards to watch the gate but they won't be able to hold out much longer.
Commander: Do you think you will be able to help them out?
Commander: They have set up amongst some trees just beyond the bridge.
{CHARACTER_NAME}: Thanks, I'll go see what I can do.

Task.TaskText: Once you have done this speak to a Commander to complete the quest.

Conversation.Dialogue: {CHARACTER_NAME}: The Blood Elves are now on the back foot. Your defences should be able to hold out for the meantime but it won't be long before they strengthen their numbers.
Commander: Thanks {CHARACTER_NAME}, you have saved the people a lot of worry. Now might be a good time to go on the offensive.
